100101:
I want to be proud of myself!
So... I must win!
100102:
Let's make this summer
one to never forget♪
100103:
I'll make your dreams come true
by being Japan's fastest!
100201:
To go even further beyond...
To the scenery never seen before!
100202:
The wind calls...
To go beyond the blue seas!
100301:
This is where it starts...
The legend of the unbeatable Teio!
100302:
I'm... not giving up! I'll
be the strongest to ever exist!
100401:
Can you keep up with
my outstanding speed?
100602:
Merry Christmas...
I came to grand your wish...!
100702:
Blue skies, the blue sea...
And of course, the golden me!
100802:
Be nice and wait, okay?
Let me fulfil your dream!
100902:
In this sea of lights,
I'm your #1 brightest, right?
101001:
BANG! Let's leave
a dent in this world!
101002:
Flash! Got your smile!
And the victory too!
101201:
You're doing a one-on-one
and I'm your opponent!
101901:
If it's for my fave...
Grass, sand, I'll conquer them all!
102403:
Ready for Maya-nyan's night fright?
Ehe, catch me if you can, meow!
102601:
I will follow your directions
for the first mission, master.
102801:
I'll give you a taste of buono!
Let's go, dosukoi!
103001:
I want to see everyone smile...
That's my reason for running!
103701:
The key to victory
is a perfect schedule.
103703:
Will you help me make
the schedule for our vacation?
103801:
Tee-hee♪ Praise me
as much as you can!
103802:
I'll make you experience
my destiny, okay?♪
104202:
My magic shall paint
this world over!
104401:
Twinkle, twinkle☆ I'll bestow
upon you, my bestest magic!
104402:
Hey! Escort me already!
I'm looking for special magic!
104502:
No need to be afraid!
Your mummy is here♪
105501:
You, me, today, tomorrow,
the whole world is marvelous★☆
105801:
L-L-L-L-L-L-Look at this!
Wha—?! Out of time...?!
106002:
Could this cheer you up? No,
it will! Go, Fight, Win!
106401:
Great escape! Super escape!
Uber escape, no cap!
108001:
New, unseen things...!
I want to feel their thrill!
108301:
Mission: Start.
I must... repay my favor.
108701:
I'm Aston Machan, the Umamusume.
Don't forget about me, okay?
110601:
Don't expect too much of me.
I'm pretty average, okay?
111001:
Together we shall become
the foundation for the future!
111601:
The most powerful being is me,
Gentildonna. And I will prove it.
112001:
Hmph, can you see me at all?
These legs can surpass even light!
112101:
The holy sword has been unsheathed!
I shall bring you glory, my lord!
